articles.author: Pathikrit Sanyal
articles.title: Congress lost Rajasthan but not by much in vote share, BJP had much higher margins - India Today
articles.description: The BJP won 115 seats in Rajasthan while the Congress only won 69. However, the Congress got 39.5 per cent of the vote share and the BJP had 41.7 per cent -- making the difference between the two parties only 2.2 per cent.
